column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Toph says : " Well , what 'd you know ?
#Text=Aang , you go with Iroh to look for Katara and the angry jerk , no offense .
#Text=" Iroh says : " None taken .
#Text=" Sokka says : " And I 'll go with Toph to warn the Earth King of Azula 's coup .
#Text=" Aang says : " So , Toph thinks you give pretty good advice , and great tea !
#Text=" Iroh says : " The key to both is proper aging .
#Text=What 's on your mind ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , I met with this guru who was supposed to help me master the Avatar State and control this great power , but to do it , I had to let go of someone I love .
#Text=And I just could n't .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Perfection and power are overrated .
#Text=I think you were very wise to choose happiness and love .
#Text=" Aang says : " What happens if we ca n't save anyone and beat Azula ?
#Text=Without the Avatar State , what if I 'm not powerful enough ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " I do n't know the answer .
#Text=Sometimes , life is like this dark tunnel .
#Text=You ca n't always see the light at the end of the tunnel , but if you just keep moving , you will come to a better place .
#Text="
